statements: SELECT inmate_name, admission_date, release_date FROM InmateRecords;
SELECT * FROM InmateRecords WHERE inmate_id = 1;
SELECT inmate_name, rehabilitation_progress FROM InmateRecords WHERE rehabilitation_progress > 50;
SELECT inmate_name, admission_date, release_date FROM InmateRecords ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_name, admission_date, release_date FROM InmateRecords WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InmateRecords WHERE admission_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT inmate_name, rehabilitation_progress FROM InmateRecords WHERE rehabilitation_progress >= 50 ORDER BY rehabilitation_progress DESC
SELECT * FROM InmateRecords WHERE release_date IS NULL
SELECT inmate_name, admission_date, release_date FROM InmateRecords WHERE inmate_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT * FROM InmateRecords WHERE inmate_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM inmate_records WHERE id = 1;
SELECT inmate_name, release_date FROM inmate_records WHERE rehabilitation_progress IS NULL;
SELECT inmate_name, rehabilitation_progress FROM inmate_records ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_name, progress_date, progress_details FROM rehabilitation_progress WHERE inmate_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM inmate_records;
SELECT * FROM inmate_records WHERE inmate_id = 100;
SELECT inmate_name, entry_date FROM inmate_records WHERE rehabilitation_progress = 'Completed' ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_id, inmate_name, entry_date, release_date FROM inmate_records WHERE entry_date < '2022-01-01' AND release_date IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT inmate_id FROM rehabilitation_progress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT inmate_name, rehabilitation_progress FROM inmate_records WHERE release_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY inmate_name ASC, release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inmates;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Inmates WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Charges ORDER BY charge_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_id, first_name, last_name, sentence_end_date FROM Inmates WHERE sentence_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT progress_id, inmate_id, progress_description FROM Rehabilitation_Progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Inmates ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Inmates WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM Inmates WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM Inmates WHERE sentence_end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT Charges.charge_description, Charges.charge_date, Inmates.first_name, Inmates.last_name FROM Charges INNER JOIN Inmates ON Charges.inmate_id = Inmates.inmate_id ORDER BY charge_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inmates;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM inmates WHERE age > 25;
SELECT inmate_id, first_name, sentence FROM inmates WHERE sentence LIKE '%life%';
SELECT * FROM offenses WHERE fine_amount > 1000;
SELECT inmate_id, program_id, progress_status FROM inmate_progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inmates WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, sentence, start_date, release_date FROM inmates WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT inmate_id, first_name, last_name, sentence, release_date FROM inmates JOIN offenses ON inmates.inmate_id = offenses.offense_id WHERE offense_type = 'Theft' AND sentence_length > 5;
SELECT * FROM rehabilitation_programs WHERE duration >= 30 ORDER BY program_name ASC;

SELECT inmates.first_name, inmates.last_name, rehabilitation_programs.program_name, inmate_progress.progress_status FROM inmates JOIN inmate_progress ON inmates.inmate_id = inmate_progress.inmate_id JOIN rehabilitation_programs ON inmate_progress.program_id = rehabilitation_programs.program_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM inmates ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT inmate_id, first_name, last_name FROM inmates WHERE age > 30;
SELECT inmate_id, first_name, last_name, release_date FROM inmates WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM offenses WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY offense_name DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, duration FROM rehabilitation_programs WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM inmates WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM inmates WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM offenses WHERE severity = 'High' AND description ILIKE '%violent%';
SELECT inmates.first_name, offenses.offense_name FROM inmates JOIN inmate_offenses ON inmates.inmate_id = inmate_offenses.inmate_id JOIN offenses ON offenses.offense_id = inmate_offenses.offense_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name, program_name FROM inmates JOIN inmate_programs ON inmates.inmate_id = inmate_programs.inmate_id JOIN rehabilitation_programs ON rehabilitation_programs.program_id = inmate_programs.program_id ORDER BY last_name;
